com.label305.stan.geofencing

Class GeofenceRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.label305.stan.geofencing.GeofenceRequester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationClient.OnAddGeofencesResultListener

    public class GeofenceRequester
extends Object
implements com.google.android.gms.location.LocationClient.OnAddGeofencesResultListener, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener
    Class for connecting to Location Services and requesting geofences. Note: Clients must ensure that Google Play services is available before requesting geofences. Use GooglePlayServicesUtil.isGooglePlayServicesAvailable() to check.

    To use a GeofenceRequester, instantiate it and call addGeofence(). Everything else is done automatically.

        Start adding geofences. Save the geofences, then start adding them by requesting a connection
        Parameters:
        geofences - A List of one or more geofences to add
